name: RenauIoTcontroller
0:
”Alexa open i o t controller”
”Give me temperature”
”Add item to kitchen group”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i. o. t. controller
des:
Alexa skill made by Reanu to manage your IoT devices. To use this skill you need to contact us because it require our devices and account. Our website: www.renau.com

Before you use functionality of this skill launch skill saying "Alexa open I o T controller".

Thinks you can do:

You can ask Alexa about state in your devices. To do so tell parameter you want to know. For example simply say, "Give me temperature"

'If you would like, you can join device in group and ask me about parameter from every device from that group at the same time.

'To create group say, "create a {group name}"

'To add item to your group say, "add item to {group name}"

'To read all items from your group say, "What items are {group name}?".

'To delete item from your group say, "Delete item from {group name}".

'To read all your groups you can say, "What groups do i have?".

'To read all your devices you can say, "What devices do i have?".
